root.name: The Legend of Oasis
root.description: OverviewA light action/rpg with multiple weapons and spirits to vary the combat a bit. Similar to the legend of zelda dungeons always have puzzles to figure out using the different skills you learn along the way.The Next Spirit King - Story introOur hero Leon lives in Oasis while studying to be a great warrior. But n the past two great warriors fought each other for sovereignty over oasis. They had two armlets of power. One made a gold wielded by Reharl and one of Silver wielded by Agito. Back in the present the Golden armlet was found by Leon's dad Ordan which can only mean the vile Agito has once again risen from his unearthly grave.
